description: A new trail openbeted in June 2017, Sooke Wilderness trail lies between Humpback Reservoir in Sooke Hills Regional Park in the CRD and the boundary with the CVRD (Cowichan Valley RD). The trail is an opportunity to connect with nature and travels through some open areas and woodlands.
directions: from south humpback reservoir parking lot N48 28.862 W 123 33.288North Parking lot on Goldstream heights drive N48 31.944 W123 34.748
title: Sooke Wilderness
